{"Other Type": {"selectedText": "Thank you for visiting the Smithsonian Institution network of Websites and reviewing our Privacy Statement. {"Other Type": {"selectedText": "Within the Smithsonian's Websites there are embedded applications, plug-ins, widgets or links to non-Smithsonian Websites (collectively \"sites\"). {"Audience Type": {"selectedText": "The Smithsonian's Websites are intended to be accessible and enjoyed by general audiences.
